definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

pinyin: liang4 zi3 dian4 dong4 li4 xue2

sentences.english: The Leaf is an all-electric vehicle that is designed for short commutes.
sentences.chinese: 聆风则是专为短途代步而设计的电动车。

sentences.english: Weatherproof or explosion proof electric actuator.
sentences.chinese: 电动执行机构的气候保护或防爆保护。

sentences.english: An intelligent electric power steering system was designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计了一种智能电动式电子控制动力转向系统。

sentences.english: Learn how to maintain handheld grinders free power tools video.
sentences.chinese: 学习如何保持手持式电动工具磨床免费视频。

sentences.english: He flies a motor  glider and small airplanes.
sentences.chinese: 现在他可以驾驶电动滑翔机和小型飞机。

sentences.english: A new control system of electric door was introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍中了一种新型电动门驱动及控制系统。

sentences.english: He makes fresh orange juice with an electric extractor.
sentences.chinese: 他用电动榨汁机榨取新鲜的橙汁。

sentences.english: Concepts of group velocity and dispersion in electrodynamics course are discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了电动力学教学过程有关群速度及色散的概念。

sentences.english: This paper presents an improved scheme of rotor position estimation for PMSM.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种永磁同步电动机转子位置估算的改进方法。

sentences.english: This article has designed training car's vice-steering system based on the electric power steering.
sentences.chinese: 设计了基于电动转向的教练车副转向系统。

sentences.english: Full Electric Stacker is a small lifting kind.
sentences.chinese: 全电动堆高机是小型起重机械的一种。

sentences.english: Electro valves installed in a box.
sentences.chinese: 电动阀安装在一个盒子内。

sentences.english: The warranty covers all power-train components.
sentences.chinese: 保修单包括了电动火车的所有零件。

sentences.english: Not to mention the vast extra burden on the electricity grid.
sentences.chinese: 电动汽车还会对电网造成额外负担。

sentences.english: Platform especially suitable for electric vehicles and electric vehicles and other small luggage checked machinery.
sentences.chinese: 特别适用于电动平台车和电动行李车等小型托运机械。

sentences.english: Platform especially suitable for electric vehicles and electric vehicles and other small luggage checked machinery.
sentences.chinese: 特别适用于电动平台车和电动行李车等小型托运机械。

definition: Toyota or Toyoda (name)/Toyota, Japanese car make
supercar/abbr. to 超跑|超跑[chao1 pao3]
